properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_WRITER , ENROLL_DATE , NOTICE_COUNT , NOTICE_ATTACH FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO CONTACT ( CONTACT_NO , CONTACT_TYPE , CONTACT_TITLE , CONTACT_CONTENT , CONTACT_WRITER , CONTACT_EMAIL , CONTACT_PHONE , CONTACT_ATTACH ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT TOS_NO , TOS_TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , TOS_NOTE FROM TOS WHERE TOS_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TOS_NO DESC
